Dispute_Type: Civil dispute over intellectual property rights
Legal_Issue: Whether the respondents infringed Warman's copyright in three works and whether remedies are applicable
Evidence_Assessment: Warman failed to prove substantial reproduction for two works; third claim time-barred
Burden_of_Proof: On Warman as applicant to prove infringement
Credibility_Factor: Warman's inability to substantiate claims affected credibility
Legal_Rule: Infringement occurs when someone reproduces or communicates a substantial part of a work without authorization under the Copyright Act
Standard_of_Review: Objective assessment of copyright infringement and limitation period application
Procedural_Issue: Timeliness of claim under s. 41(1) limitation period
Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged unauthorized use of copyrighted materials on respondents' website
Outcome_on_Merits: No infringement proven on two works; third claim statute-barred
Judicial_Review_Outcome: Not applicable – original decision, not an appeal
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Court analyzed each work, defenses, and statutory limits
Key_Evidence_Considered: Nature and extent of reproduction of the three works, timing of alleged infringement
Legal_Framework: Copyright Act, including provisions on infringement, fair dealing, implied consent, and limitation periods
Applicant_Challenge: Failure to prove substantial copying and delay in filing
Court_Result: Dismissal of Warman's application with costs awarded to respondents
Defendant_Response: Defenses of fair dealing and implied consent raised
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence of works, website content, timelines
Remedy_Sought: Damages or other relief for alleged infringement
Legal_Provision: s. 41(1) of the Copyright Act (limitation period)
Authority: Federal Court jurisdiction under Copyright Act
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Time-bar under s. 41(1); lack of proof of substantial reproduction
Applicable_Process: Civil litigation process under federal jurisdiction
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Warman's application for relief was pending and ultimately dismissed
Governing_Rule: Copyright Act – rules on infringement, fair dealing, limitation periods
